data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Moneragala, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Moneragala, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Moneragala, Sri Lanka to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Moneragala, Sri Lanka that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Moneragala, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bohra people.
Spirit, train the church of Moneragala, Sri Lanka to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 10,200 souls in Moneragala and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Moneragala, Sri Lanka. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Moneragala
location.people_groups_list: Sindhi (Muslim traditions), Madari (Muslim traditions), Divehi, Marakkalage, Burmese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sindhi (Muslim traditions) (1,000), Madari (Muslim traditions) (500), Divehi (1,900), Marakkalage (8,700), Burmese (600)
